p: The mice were weighed at the beginning and end of the experiment to evaluate the toxicological effects. Animals were observed for signs of abnormality throughout the study. A hematological analysis was performed using the Advia 60 hematology system (Bayer, Leverkusen, Germany). Livers, kidneys, lungs, and hearts were removed, weighed, and examined for signs of gross lesion formation, color change, and/or hemorrhaging.
